1.content:
Rogue was cooking when she felt storng armed wraped around her.
Umm wheres the kids asked rogue as she leaned into gambit.
Outside cherie said gambit as he turned his wife around & kissed her.
Rogue and gambit had gotten married not long after rogue learned to control her powers.
After a year of marrage rogue got pregnant with Oliver their first child.
Then two years after Oliver was born came bakka.
Years later came the most recent addenton to the family came two year old jenna.
Rogue broke the kiss she shared with gambit.
You know swamp rat it's your lips that keeps adding to my waistline said rogue
How that be Cherie asked gambit.
Well first it's kissing then loving then next thing I know I'm knocked up with your spwan fast forward a bit and I can't shave off five pounds of left over baby weight said rogue. Don't worry da added weight look good on you river rat said gambit.
It really did the extra 15 pounds made rogue look even better then before.
Her large breast grow even bigger. Her belly lost some toness but had a cutness to it.
Her face a bit fuller. Her butt had grown bigger then ever before.
So you wouldn't be brothered if I gained a bit more weight asked rogue.
You got noting to worry about gambit will love you know matter what said gambit.
Good cause in the next months I'm gonna be getting real fat said rogue.
You want to get fat asked a very confussed gambit.
Well no butt it's what happends when you knock me up sugah said rogue.
Huh your pregnant with my spawn again asked gambit.
Yep you did it again swamp rat said rogue.
Gambit grabed rogue & spun her around in his arms then gave her a big long kiss.
1.title: A romy story

11.content:
Mom dad two kids said rushing in the kids yelling Broke apart their parents kissing.
Ewww why do they have to do that all the time 6 year old bakka asked her older brother 8 year old Oliver.
Couse it's what parents do expland gambit
11.title: Keep with this story

info.brief_description: the future of rogue and gambit is in your hands
info.description: So this is set some time in the future the main charaters are rogue & gambit it's your job to deside what happends to them as a couple Heres a few rules rogue & gambit can't break and keep the rating in mind when adding that's about it
